law.catch_line: If any person gives a check to the clerk to pay for any charge or for any other purpose and the chec...
law.text: If any person gives a check to the clerk to pay for any charge or for any other purpose and the check is not honored by the bank on which it is drawn, the clerk may impose a service charge of $10 against the party drawing the check. This charge shall be in addition to any other penalty prescribed by law.
